table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Log where { Log_Table <o> @Search:Log_Table and } { Log_AccountID = (Select Account_ID from wcms_Account where Account_Name = @Search:Log_Account) and } 1 = 1 ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Log_ID] ,DATEADD(hour, {@TIMEZONE}, Log_DateTime) as [Log_DateTime] ,[Log_Do] ,[Log_Table] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Log_ID] ,[Log_DateTime] ,[Log_Do] ,[Log_Table] from wcms_Log where { Log_Table <o> @Search:Log_Table and } { Log_AccountID = (Select Account_ID from wcms_Account where Account_Name = @Search:Log_Account) and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
